history.proof: intros m z H1 H2 nr. split. - apply upb_pos. apply H2. - split. + apply Iter_upb_period. apply H1. apply H2. + intros i H3. shelve.

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 nr.
exceptions.tactic: apply (not_exds_Iter_f_i m z i H2 nr).
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z nr := Iter_upb m z : nat i : nat H3 : 0 < i < nr The term "H2" has type "exd m z" while it is expected to have type "i <= Iter_upb m z".

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 nr.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z nr := Iter_upb m z : nat i : nat H3 : 0 < i < nr Unable to unify "0 < i < nr" with "Iter (f m) i z <> z".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in 0 < nr /\ Iter (f m) nr z = z /\ (forall i : nat, 0 < i < nr -> Iter (f m) i z <> z)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z) : fmap -> dart -> nat
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0 => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dart = nat : Set
ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) nr z}
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> card s <= ndN m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) nr z = z
P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> card s <= ndN m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | i < nr /\ Iter (f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) j z /\ j < p}
LP7 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, n0 < j <= nr - 1 -> Iter (f m) n0 z <> Iter (f m) j z
P7 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, n0 < j <= nr - 1 -> Iter (f m) n0 z <> Iter (f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in j < p -> k < p -> Iter (f m) j z = Iter (f m) k z -> j = k
diff_int = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) => forall i j : nat, a <= i /\ i < j <= b -> Iter (f m) i z <> Iter (f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
expo1 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (let p := Iter_upb m z in exists j : nat, j < p /\ Iter (f m) j z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z -> Iter (f m) p z = z
Iter_plus_inv : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z
Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) i (Iter (f m) i z) = z
upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> 0 < Iter_upb m z
Iter_f_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (S i) z = Iter (f m) i (f m z)
exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in i <= n -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z)
diff_orb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z (fmap_to_set m) in diff_int m z 0 (nr - 1) : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> j <= i -> Iter (f_1 m) j (Iter (f m) i z) = Iter (f m) (i - j) z
f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> f_1 m (Iter (f m) (S i) z) = Iter (f m) i z
period_uniform : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter_upb m z = Iter_upb m (Iter (f m) i z)
not_exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), let sr := Iter_rem m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in i <= n -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
Iter_f_1_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) (S i) z = Iter (f_1 m) i (f_1 m z)
LP8 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> diff_int m z n0 (nr - 1)
LP6 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> exds_int m z n0 (nr - 1) s
Iter_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
rem_1_step : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in card sr + 1 <= card s < -> exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)
P8 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> diff_int m z n0 (nr - 1) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
rem_2_steps : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in card sr + 2 <= card s -> exds (Ds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)) (Iter (f m) (ndN m + 1 - card s) z)
P6 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> card s <= ndN m -> let n0 := ndN m - card s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> exds_int m z n0 (nr - 1) s : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
LR1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ndN m - card s <= i <= n -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
succ_pred_clos : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z <> nil /\ cA_1 m k z <> nil
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
R1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ndN m - card s <= i <= n -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z) : fmap -> dart -> nat -> set -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _]
diff_int_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (t : dart) => forall i : nat, a <= i <= b -> Iter (f m) i z <> t : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> dart -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope _]
Iter_comp : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), Iter (f m) (i + j) z = Iter (f m) i (Iter (f m) j z)

``` 
intros m z H1 H2 nr.
split.
- apply upb_pos. exact H2.
- split.
  + apply Iter_upb_period. exact H1. exact H2.
  + intros i H3. apply (not_exds_Iter_f_i m z i H2 nr). exact H3.
```

original: intros m z H1 H2 nr. split. - apply upb_pos. apply H2. - split. + apply Iter_upb_period. apply H1. apply H2. + intros i H3. apply (not_exds_Iter_f_i m z i H2 nr). apply H3.
